Workflow.WorkStageName: Received By SWIFT?

The function of this screen is to **receive and process R/A SWIFT messages** related to **MT799 and MT740** transactions.
① It captures incoming **MT799 and MT740 SWIFT messages** from correspondent banks.
② The system **validates the message format and content** to ensure compliance with internal and regulatory requirements.

The function of this screen is to **receive and process R/A SWIFT messages** related to **MT799 and MT740** transactions.
① It captures incoming **MT799 and MT740 SWIFT messages** from correspondent banks.
② The system **validates the message format and content** to ensure compliance with internal and regulatory requirements.

The function of this screen is to **approve the credit line** for the **L/C Issuing Bank**.
① Users can review the Issuing Bank’s credit limit details and assess its eligibility for approval.
② Based on the evaluation, users can either **approve, modify, or reject** the requested credit line.

The function of this screen is to **register and manage reimbursement requests** for transactions that require repayment.
① **Enter** the necessary reimbursement details, including the amount, reason, and associated transaction information.
② **Submit** the request for approval, triggering a review process by authorized personnel.
③ **Track** the status of submitted requests, from initial registration to final approval or rejection.
Received by SWIFT?

The function of this screen is to **process incoming SWIFT messages (MT742) related to payment claims**.
① When an **MT742 message** is received, the system verifies the payment claim details.
② If an **MT999 message** is received instead, payment **cannot be processed**, and the system must generate and send a **payment rejection message**.

The function of this screen is to **check for duplicate claims before registration** and retrieve the relevant RA Number.
① **Enter** the **L/C number** in the designated field.
② **Click** the **Search** button to retrieve matching records.
③ **Select** the appropriate **RA Number** from the search results.

The function of this screen is to **register and manage claim documents** related to financial transactions or customer requests.
① Users can **input claim details**, including claimant information, claim type, and supporting documents.
② The system **validates the entered data** and ensures all required fields are completed.
③ Once submitted, the claim is **stored in the system** for further review and processing.
New York Branch?
Need to stop payment?

The function of this screen is to **select a hold type** and **enter detailed information** for the hold.
① **Choose** the appropriate **hold type** from the available options.
② **Input** the necessary **details** related to the selected hold.
③ **Confirm** and **save** the entered information to complete the process.

The function of this screen is to **generate an MT799 message** when required.
① It allows users to create and prepare the **MT799 SWIFT message**, which serves as a **pre-advice or notification** in trade finance transactions.
② If necessary, the system validates the message details before submission.

The function of this screen is to **notify the Treasury Department** to **prepare funding** for upcoming disbursements.
① The system identifies payment requests that require funding.
② It then generates a notification to inform the Treasury Department.

The function of this screen is to **search for payment records** and **register data for claim payments**.
① **Retrieve** the payment list based on specified search criteria.
② **Review** the listed payments to identify the relevant transactions.
③ **Enter and register** the required details for claim payments.
④ **Confirm and submit** the registered data for processing.
Usance?

The function of this screen is to **register additional bill information** for **claim payments**.
① Users can enter and update bill details related to a claim.
② The system verifies the input data to ensure accuracy and completeness.
London branch?
"Is it a **single transaction processing**?"

The function of this screen is to **generate and print** a **voucher** and an **MT202 payment message**.
① The system retrieves the relevant transaction details.
② A **voucher** is generated, containing key payment information for record-keeping or reference.
③ An **MT202** message, which is used for financial institution-to-financial institution fund transfers, is formatted according to SWIFT standards.
④ The user can review and confirm the details before printing.
⑤ Upon confirmation, both the **voucher** and **MT202** are printed and stored for compliance and audit purposes.
New York Branch?

The function of this screen is to **submit an approval request for final confirmation**.
① Users can enter relevant details and attach necessary documents before submission.
② Approvers receive a notification and can review, approve, or reject the request.

The function of this screen is to **prepare and transmit MT202 and MT799 messages** for financial transactions.
① **MT202** messages facilitate fund transfers between financial institutions, ensuring secure and efficient settlement.
② **MT799** messages serve as pre-advice or free-format messages used for documentary and trade finance transactions.
Users can **input, review, and validate message details** before transmission, ensuring compliance with banking standards.

The function of this screen is to **select a purchase order (PO) from the list and proceed with the next step by pressing the "Enter" button**.
① **Select** the desired PO from the available list.
② **Press the "Enter" button** to confirm the selection and proceed to the next process.

The function of this screen is to **process selected payment transactions**.
① **Select** the desired payment transactions from the list.
② **Click** the **"Process"** button to initiate the transaction processing.
New York Branch?

The function of this screen is to **generate a file and modify its details**.
① Click **"GenerateFile"** to create a new file.
② Navigate to the **"Modify"** tab.
③ Enter the required information to update or customize the file.
Received By SWIFT?

The function of this screen is to **receive and process amendment SWIFT messages** related to reimbursement authorization (**MT747, MT799**).
① **Retrieve incoming SWIFT messages** for amendment requests.
② **Validate and log** the details of the received messages.
③ **Display key information**, including sender, reference numbers, and amendment details.

The function of this screen is to **receive and process amendment SWIFT messages** related to reimbursement authorization (**MT747, MT799**).
① **Retrieve incoming SWIFT messages** for amendment requests.
② **Validate and log** the details of the received messages.
③ **Display key information**, including sender, reference numbers, and amendment details.

The function of this screen is to **register and manage amendments to R/A data**.
① Users can input and update **revised R/A details**, ensuring accurate record-keeping.
② The system validates the entered data against predefined rules to maintain compliance.
③ Once submitted, the amended R/A data is stored and can be retrieved for future reference.

The function of this screen is to **search for a Letter of Credit (L/C) by its number and verify the amendment of the Reimbursement Authorization (R/A).**
① **Search** for the L/C using its number.
② **Click** the **"Info"** button to review the amendment details.
③ **Verify** whether the amendment has been correctly applied.
④ If the amendment is correct, **write the check number** in the **top right corner** of the SWIFT MT747 document using a **red pen**.
Amend Bill?

The function of this screen is to **register and amend data** efficiently.
① Users can input the necessary corrections or new data.
② Once the amendments are complete, they must **press "Enter"** to submit the changes.

The function of this screen is to **record and manage amendment requests** for bills.
① When an amendment request is received, the system **logs the details** for reference.
② If the bill has been amended, the system **does not automatically issue an Acceptance Advice**.

The function of this screen is to **generate MT799 messages**, which serve as pre-advice or notifications in financial transactions.
① Users can input transaction details, including sender and receiver information, message content, and reference numbers.
② The system validates the entered data to ensure compliance with SWIFT standards.
③ Once validated, the MT799 message is formatted accordingly and prepared for transmission.
At Maturity Settlement?
is this Prepayment, NOT Extend Bill?

The function of this screen is to **receive and process requests for prepayment of R/A (Repayment/Amortization) before the maturity date** via **SWIFT messages**.
① The system detects incoming SWIFT messages related to prepayment requests.
② It extracts relevant details, such as loan reference number, requested prepayment amount, and settlement date.
③ The extracted data is validated against existing loan records.
④ If valid, the system updates the repayment schedule and generates a confirmation message.

The function of this screen is to **record and manage prepayment transactions** for corporate customers.
① **Enter prepayment details**, including payment amount, date, and relevant contract information.
② **Verify the entered data** to ensure accuracy and compliance with internal policies.
③ **Submit the prepayment request** for processing, triggering necessary system validations.
④ **Review and confirm transaction status**, with options to modify or cancel before final approval.
is this In Advance case, NOT In Arrear

The function of this screen is to **recalculate the interest amount** and **refund the adjusted interest** to the **Headquarters (HQ)** for the **remaining tenor** of the loan.
① The system recalculates the interest based on the updated loan conditions.
② Any excess or deficit interest is determined.
③ The system processes a refund or adjustment transaction to HQ accordingly.

The function of this screen is to **prepare and send MT799 messages**, which are **automatically generated** within screen **[184400]**.
① The system **automatically generates** an MT799 message based on predefined conditions.
② Users can **review the generated message** and make necessary modifications before transmission.

The function of this screen is to **recalculate the interest amount** and **request reimbursement from HQ**.
① The system **reassesses the accrued interest** based on updated parameters or adjustments.
② After recalculating, the system **generates a request** for the interest difference to be settled by the headquarters.
③ The recalculated amount is then **processed and transferred** from HQ to the branch, ensuring accurate financial reconciliation.

The function of this screen is to **manage the extension of bill maturities** while ensuring compliance with predefined conditions.
① **Automatic notification** is sent when an extension request is received.
② Extensions are **allowed up to two times**, regardless of the amount. From the **third extension**, consultation with an authorized representative is required.
③ Each extension **must not exceed 90 days**, and the total extended period **must not exceed one year** from the **initial acceptance date**.
Tokyo 지점?

The function of this screen is to **process bill rollovers** by registering rollover details based on a SWIFT request.
① **Select a bill** from the list.
② **Enter the rollover information**, ensuring it matches the details in the SWIFT rollover request.
③ **Confirm and save** the rollover details for processing.

The function of this screen is to **generate** MT754 messages, which are used in documentary credit transactions to notify banks of discrepancies in documents presented under a letter of credit.
① The system **compiles relevant transaction details**, including discrepancies and documentary credit references.
② It **formats the information** according to SWIFT MT754 standards.

The function of this screen is to **retrieve and display a list of bill balances** and provide an option to **print the selected information**.
① The system **fetches bill balance records** based on specified criteria.
② Users can **review the listed balances** and verify relevant details.
단건처리인가?

The function of this screen is to **process individual payment settlements** on the **maturity date**.
① It allows users to review and execute **single transaction settlements** that are due for payment.
② The system verifies the transaction details and ensures that the payment is processed accurately.

The function of this screen is to **verify and settle bill balances**.
① **Check** the output from **185500 (Bill Balance List)** to ensure accuracy.
② **Compare** the displayed information with the printed bill balance details.
③ **Confirm** any discrepancies and take necessary actions.
④ **Process the settlement** once the verification is complete.

The function of this screen is to **register the Current Balance and proceed to the next step**.
① **Enter** the desired **Current Balance** in the input field.
② **Press "Enter"** to confirm the entry and proceed.

The function of this screen is to **verify and confirm data accuracy** before proceeding to the next step.
① The user **reviews the displayed data** to ensure correctness.
② After verification, the user **presses "Enter"** to confirm and proceed.
Need to amend?

The function of this screen is to **verify and process incoming payment transactions** from the **Head Office**.
① It **receives and displays** payment instructions sent by the Head Office.
② The system **validates the transaction details**, ensuring accuracy and compliance with internal policies.

The function of this screen is to **generate and print reports** detailing **Nostro/Vostro transaction history**.
① **Retrieve** transaction records for Nostro and Vostro accounts based on specified criteria (e.g., date range, account number, currency).
② **Display** the filtered transaction details, including debits, credits, balances, and relevant references.

The function of this screen is to **prepare and generate a GL voucher** for the settlement of a received amount.
① The system processes **accounting entries** for the received funds.
② After accounting is completed, it **generates a GL voucher** with the relevant financial details.

The function of this screen is to **verify whether the current balance is zero** in a specified account.
① The system retrieves the latest balance information from the database.
② If the balance is exactly **"0"**, the system confirms this status.

The function of this screen is to **approve credit limits for risk participation** in financial transactions.
① Users can submit requests for **risk participation limit approval**, specifying the transaction details and required credit amount.
② The system validates the request based on **predefined credit policies and risk assessment criteria**.

The function of this screen is to **register an RP once its acceptance has been confirmed**.
① The system allows users to input and verify RP details after a decision has been made.
② Users can submit the RP for official registration, ensuring it is recorded in the system.

The function of this screen is to **search for and review RP data before processing**.
① **Retrieve** the relevant RP data by entering the required search criteria.
② **Review** the details of the retrieved RP data to ensure accuracy.
③ **Proceed with processing** by pressing the **Enter** button once verification is complete.

The function of this screen is to **process approvals and transmit SWIFT messages**, followed by sending scanned documents to the recipient bank.
① **Upon approval**, the system sends the required **SWIFT message** (e.g., MT799, MT202).
② **After transmission**, users must **scan the relevant documents** (MT799, MT202, and the signed O&A).
③ **Finally, the scanned documents are sent** via email to the recipient bank.

The function of this screen is to **process and manage the signing and forwarding of original documents** related to a deal.
① When **two copies** of the original document **arrive**, review and sign both.
② **Retain one signed copy** for internal records.
③ **Send the other signed copy** to the counterparty bank.
④ The **deal date** should be recorded as the **date on which the transaction was executed**.
Amend?

The function of this screen is to **view and amend RP conditions**.
① **Search for the target RP** that requires condition modification.
② **Review the existing RP details** to verify the required changes.
③ **Enter and register the amended conditions** in the system.

The function of this screen is to **search for and select an RP to settle its principal amount**.
① **Retrieve** RP records based on specified criteria.
② **Select** the target RP from the search results.
③ **Initiate** the principal settlement process for the selected RP.

The function of this screen is to **process RP interest settlements** by allowing users to **search for and select RP**.
① **Search** for the relevant RP transactions.
② **Select** the RP transaction(s) that require interest settlement.
③ **Confirm** and proceed with the interest settlement process.
